item.title: Adults with learning disabilities: economic outcomes
item.description: Michael: On this episode, I went to speak to Rob Watts. Rob is one of the Researchers of Fraser of Allander Institute, and theyâ€™re carrying out a new project on adults with a learning disability in Scotland. So I was asking Rob about his research and the work that they do. So Rob, first of all, can you tell us about the Fraser of Allander Institute and what kind of work that you do?
